Merge pull request #1 from github/vmg/multipacket

Implement multi-metrics mode for Statsd
statsd-secure: Proper packet size

statsd: Increase max packet size to 8k

The MTU inside our network is large enough to support transmiting large
UDP packets; the largest the packet, the more metrics we can fit in
multi-metric mode and the more throughput for the daemon.

The receive buffer has been switched to heap-allocated, because 8k may
be slightly too much for the stack.
Implement multi-metrics mode for Statsd

Merge pull request #12 from haneefmubarak/patch-2

apply changes from #4 to utils.h

use -pthread instead of -lpthread when compiling

And here is why: http://stackoverflow.com/a/23251828/2334407

use pthread_yield if bus yielding is unavailable

If a platform does not support bus yielding, yield the threads' cpu timeslice early.
